channel.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
channel.description: Ages ago, when the BM blog was new, Angry Beaver (I think) made a HL2 map that was designed to be similar to Black Mesa. Sorta like a sneak peak if you will. I have not played this map in a while, and was wondering if someone could link me to it.

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: s1e9a8n5
item.description:
Glad you finally got what you were asking for PlausibleSarge. And you didn’t have to wait a week!

Thank’s for being kind Drew++ This forum could use more people like yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
I remember this map being mentioned, and I th- Wait wait wait wait…
Something about a double post? What’s that got to do with–? What are you people ON!?
Anyway, Er, where was I… Oh yes!

I think I ran into it and had it on my old computer. If you guys are that adamant about the OP not getting it (he was a tad impatient), could anybody who knows the location of such a moderately-not-really-that-fantastic-grail PM me?

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
it was pointless from the beginning mate. I hate to break it to you.

and even if i didn’t ‘troll’ your thread, other users would undoubtedly have done the same. I’m just impressed people listened to my first post. :awesome:

[EDIT: god damnit, drew, that’s twice you’ve ninja’d me in a row. ]

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: Drew
item.description:
PlausibleSarge:

Thanks! This was exactly what I was looking for! Finally someone helpful.

One thing, I tried the map in Hl2, episode 1 and episode2, and they all either result in pink checkered textires, or game crash.

The thing is, it is quite unhelpful to hijack someones thread that way. Even if it was a joke, or wasnt too serious, it basically made the thread entirely pointless and useless.

Hmm, is it the textures, or the cubemaps? PM me.

Read full topic

One thing, I tried the map in Hl2, episode 1 and episode2, and they all either result in pink checkered textires, or game crash.

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
Drew++:

On topic… Angry beaver made an application map to showcase his skills in complex geometry, scripting, and optimizing.

I believe OnBoardError, or… maybe Stormseeker made a ‘Black Mesa’ styled map, a recreation of a HL1 level(the one where the walkway breaks, and you have to swim through some rooms). I think it was also an application to the team.

And I don’t have any links to them. I’ll be corrected on this, so be patient.

OMFG a relevant and ontopic post that doesnt incite a flame war. that would be a first.

This man deserves a medal.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: Drew
item.description:
On topic… Angry beaver made an application map to showcase his skills in complex geometry, scripting, and optimizing.

I believe OnBoardError, or… maybe Stormseeker made a ‘Black Mesa’ styled map, a recreation of a HL1 level(the one where the walkway breaks, and you have to swim through some rooms). I think it was also an application to the team.

And I don’t have any links to them. I’ll be corrected on this, so be patient.

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
nietzschesaurus:

In this post: Someone who thinks trolling over it will make people like him.

Trolling? How is it possible for someone to troll their own thread, one in which they asked a reasonable and fair question, only to be attacked by the countless morons that think starting a fight is a smart thing to do.

nietzschesaurus:

Obviously, nobody knows what map you’re talking about, or if they do they aren’t going to share it with you at this point. sorry bud.

That is the problem. The only reason people arent giving it out is because of Ibanez’s trolling. To make matters worse, all of this is over…a double post.

Seriously, even on the Steam forums, if someone double posts, people might ask them not to, then get over it and answer their question. I think you all need to grow up.

nietzschesaurus:

The point s1e9a8n5 is trying to make is if you’re a jerk the world will end.

You are taking things out of perspective on purpose in a vain attempt to justify your own actions.

Read full topic

So what? I’m human, we thrive on conflict.

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
s1e9a8n5:

Hence why it should be put in the FAQ. I could have easily done it if I didn’t just find out about it on the last page and I would probably be getting the same treatment as the OP. How fun.

Impatient perhaps but whiny tool, I disagree.

I doubt that would do any good. Seeing how something works is totally different from experiencing it. I don’t tolerate the way some of the members respond on here. Their rude and cruel. If I see someone being mistreated and I don’t agree with it, I will step in and give my opinion about it. I do not support that kind of behavior. There will be one or two that deserve it but this guy was just asking a simple question and showed impatience by double posting. Big f-n deal.

You may find the OP a whiny tool but you guys aren’t any better with your responses.

I find that there are more cruel things in life than withholding a silly map.

On a sidenote when am I going to jail to serve my lifetime sentence for my cruelty?

Read full topic

item.description:
PlausibleSarge:

lol @ all the whiny tools in this thread calling me a whiny tool.

the hypocricy level is over 9000

@Ibanez. Reported for not contributing anything worthwhile to the thread, derailing it, and completely undermining its entire purpose.

:facepalm:

Now you will never know.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa styled HL2 map.
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
Ibanez didn’t really do anything worth reporting, so I’m not going to take action. Also, we don’t strictly disallow double posting on these boards, but it is generally frowned upon, as it is better to use the edit button if you want to add something. Otherwise we have to come along and merge all your bloody posts all day.

Read full topic
